content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with a full inventory of coal (50/50 items) and currently no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with a full inventory of coal (47/50 items) and currently no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (4.0, 0.0)) with a full inventory of coal (50/50 items) and currently no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position (6.0, 0.0)) with a partial inventory of coal (3/50 items) and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Wooden Chest at position (8.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (8.5, 0.5)) with an empty inventory.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The furnace at position (0, 0) was full when trying to insert coal multiple times.

### Errors when lacking required items in inventory
- Always check your inventory before attempting to insert items into the furnace. The agent encountered multiple instances of trying to insert iron ore and coal when the inventory was empty or lacking the required quantity.

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure you have enough items in your inventory to extract from the furnace. The agent faced issues when attempting to extract iron plates without sufficient quantities available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
